definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: Baclofen was more effective in inhibiting field potentials than GABA.
sentences.chinese: 继而，左旋巴氯芬抑制场电位作用强于GABA。

sentences.english: The demonstration got out of control and fighting broke out.
sentences.chinese: 示威失去控制，继而发生殴斗。

sentences.english: Anthony wheedled. He badgered. He pouted. "Where would you get them?"
sentences.chinese: 安东尼开始花言巧语，继而纠缠不休，最后撅起了嘴。

sentences.english: That would cause the greenhouse effect and begin the terra forming.
sentences.chinese: 这会引起温室效应，继而形成土地。

sentences.english: We once thought of China as the "yellow peril" and then the "red menace."
sentences.chinese: 我们曾视中国为“黄祸”，继而视之为“红色威胁”。

sentences.english: The achievement pale night of misty rain subsequently the tower lightly has sued the desire language also shames.
sentences.chinese: 成就了淡夜烟雨继而楼台轻诉的欲语还羞。

sentences.english: Our husbands can still cheat on us and abandon us for flight attendants.
sentences.chinese: 你的丈夫很可能会为了个空姐而出轨，继而抛弃你。

sentences.english: The protagonist Gabriel changes from his primary complacence, to the later denial, and to the final real evaluation of himself.
sentences.chinese: 他从最初的沾沾自喜，走向否定自我，继而认识真我。

sentences.english: AOL became the kingpin and along came the Internet.
sentences.chinese: AOL成了主脑角色，继而诞生了互联网。

sentences.english: That could promote the growth of algal blooms which deplete oxygen in the water column.
sentences.chinese: 这会促进藻花繁生继而耗尽水体中的氧气。

sentences.english: Then the basketball team and the cheerleaders come out and sing Now Or Never.
sentences.chinese: 继而是篮球队和啦啦队长们的《更待何时》。

sentences.english: She heard her husband calling Scotty down by the barn.
sentences.chinese: 继而，她听到丈夫在谷仓那儿叫斯哥迪。

sentences.english: Joy turned to despair and then to anger.
sentences.chinese: 民众从喜悦到绝望，继而变得愤怒。
继而乌克兰的经济一落千丈。

sentences.english: Taiji is best known in the West from the name Taijiquan "Supreme Ultimate Fist".
sentences.chinese: “太极拳”在西方广为人知，继而了解了太极。

sentences.english: Furthermore, it may make the emotion mildew and produce fungus, and subsequently prompt the lesions to be occured.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，会使感情霉变而生菌，继而发生病变。

definition: to turn to (sth else)/to switch to
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
